name: Multifile Upload
author: Yoshi

sections.description: Multifile Upload plugin adds some features to the WordPress’ default upload interface. You will be able to upload more than one file at a time. You can also resize the original image by specifying the size and change the thumbnail size when uploading.
sections.installation:
1. Upload multifile-upload folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This plugin allows WP's upload interface to handle multiple files at a time. User can also change the original and thumbnail image sizes.
description: Multifile Upload plugin adds some features to the WordPress’ default upload interface. You will be able to upload more than one file at a time. You can also resize the original image by specifying the size and change the thumbnail size when uploading.
